fields.label: Description
fields.options: Enable the Bulk Selection button in sales document items table. This allows you to quickly select and add multiple items with quantities, prices, stock information, and tax-adjusted costs in an intuitive dialog with search, filtering, and pagination capabilities. When taxes with included_in_print_rate are set, the cost price will be automatically adjusted by the tax amount.

fields.options: Enable the 'Zero Allocate' button in Payment Reconciliation. This creates allocation rows with zero amounts for all selected payments and invoices, allowing manual distribution of large payments across multiple invoices without FIFO limitations.

fields.label: Prevent Cancellation if ETR Number Set
Description
fields.options: When enabled, Sales Invoices and POS Invoices with an ETR Invoice Number cannot be cancelled. This prevents accidental cancellation of tax-registered invoices.
